original_text:
For the Lord has poured out upon you
    a spirit of deep sleep,
and has closed your eyes (the prophets),
    and covered your heads (the seers).
korean_text: 대저 여호와께서 깊이 잠들게 하는 영을 너희에게 부어 주사 너희의 눈을 감기셨음이니 그가 선지자들과 너희의 지도자인 선견자들을 덮으셨음이라

sentences.original_text: For the Lord has poured out upon you
and has closed your eyes (the prophets)
